about.title: CBIT Open Source Community
about.description: COSC is a vibrant open source community based in CBIT, managed by passionate students and dedicated staff. We foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning through open source technologies. Our community provides a platform for students to explore, learn, and contribute to meaningful open source projects while building their technical skills and professional network.
about.mission: To foster innovation, collaboration, and learning through open source technologies while building a strong community of developers and contributors.
about.vision: To become the leading open source community in the region, empowering students to create impactful technology solutions.
about.location: Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology, Hyderabad

events.name: Hackweek 2025
events.description: A comprehensive week-long event featuring intensive workshops, coding challenges, project presentations, and networking opportunities. Participants will work on real-world projects while learning from industry experts.

events.name: Hacktoberfest 2024
events.description: Annual celebration of open source software with global participation. Contributors make meaningful contributions to open source projects while learning collaborative development practices.

events.name: Git & GitHub Workshop
events.description: Comprehensive workshop covering version control, collaborative development, and best practices for open source contribution.

events.name: Tech Talks Series
events.description: Regular series featuring industry experts, alumni, and community members sharing insights on latest technologies and career guidance.
events.topics: AI/ML, Web Dev, DevOps, Mobile Dev

projects.name: Campus Connect
projects.description: A comprehensive platform connecting students, faculty, and alumni for better communication and collaboration.

projects.name: Event Management System
projects.description: Streamlined system for managing college events, registrations, and participant tracking.

projects.name: Code Review Bot
projects.description: Automated bot for code review and quality assurance in student projects.
